author: Martha Cruz
title: chevron-right
text: {p}HEADLINE: Nice start to the new year{/p}{p}LOW TODAY: 42{ } { }NORMAL LOW: 39{/p}{p}HIGH TODAY: 59 NORMAL HIGH: 56{/p}{p}Not a bad way to close out 2023 with another ALMOST 60 degree day.{/p}{p}Clouds have arrived, but nothing to squeeze out of them, so your New Year's Eve forecast remains dry.{/p}{p}Temperatures by midnight tonight with hover near the 50 degree mark under mostly cloudy skies.{/p}{p}New Year's Day looks great with partly cloudy skies and mild temperatures. Look for a high near 60 once again.{/p}{p}A quick moving storm system will arrive late Wednesday with a good chance for showers and mountain snow through early Thursday morning.{/p}{p}Rainfall amounts for the valley will range from .10\" to .25\".{/p}{p}Snowfall, above 8,000 feet, will range from 4 to 8\" especially in the Spring Mountains. I expect a Winter Weather Advisory to be issued by the National Weather Service so stay tuned for more updates.{/p}{p}High temperatures will also come crashing down into the lower 50s by Thursday.{/p}{p}Another winter storm is on track for next weekend so stay tuned!{/p}{p}CURRENT SNOWPACK: UPPER COLORADO RIVER BASIN - 71% (115% last year at this time){/p}{p}LAKE MEAD TRACKER: Lake mead is currently at 1068 feet compared to 1044 feet one year ago today.{/p}{p}Total valley rainfall in 2023: 4.59\" (+0.41\" above normal){/p}{p}Total valley rainfall through December 31st, 2022: 2.13\" (-1.95\" below normal){/p}{p}AIR QUALITY - HEALTHY{/p}{p}-Bill Bellis{/p}{p}Couples from across the country packed Las Vegas wedding chapels as they looked to get married on a very unique day.{/p}{p}Ahead of the magical '123123' date, locals as well as visitors were seen lining up at the downtown Marriage License Bureau, which also opened a{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/clark-county-to-open-marriage-license-office-at-airport-for-upcoming-wedding-rush-las-vegas-southern-nevada-december-31-2023-123123#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/clark-county-to-open-marriage-license-office-at-airport-for-upcoming-wedding-rush-las-vegas-southern-nevada-december-31-2023-123123#\"} {strong}pop-up office{/strong} {/a}at Harry Reid Airport.{/p}{p}Aside from that, many couples wanted to start the year off on the right foot by getting married on January 1, like{ }Patrick and April Renfro of New Mexico, who married at The Little Vegas Chapel as the clock struck midnight.{/p}{p}{strong}MORE ON NEWS 3 |{ }{/strong}{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/watch-las-vegas-ushers-in-2024-with-a-dazzling-electric-fireworks-spectacle\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/watch-las-vegas-ushers-in-2024-with-a-dazzling-electric-fireworks-spectacle\"}{strong}WATCH: Las Vegas ushers in 2024 with a dazzling fireworks spectacle{/strong}{/a}{/p}{p}According to the chapel, they hosted 41 ceremonies on December 31, which was an increase in reservations compared to the previous year's festivities.{/p}{p}HEADLINE: Nice start to the new year{/p}{p}LOW TODAY: 42{ } { }NORMAL LOW: 39{/p}{p}HIGH TODAY: 59 NORMAL HIGH: 56{/p}{p}Not a bad way to close out 2023 with another ALMOST 60 degree day.{/p}{p}Clouds have arrived, but nothing to squeeze out of them, so your New Year's Eve forecast remains dry.{/p}{p}Temperatures by midnight tonight with hover near the 50 degree mark under mostly cloudy skies.{/p}{p}New Year's Day looks great with partly cloudy skies and mild temperatures. Look for a high near 60 once again.{/p}{p}A quick moving storm system will arrive late Wednesday with a good chance for showers and mountain snow through early Thursday morning.{/p}{p}Rainfall amounts for the valley will range from .10\" to .25\".{/p}{p}Snowfall, above 8,000 feet, will range from 4 to 8\" especially in the Spring Mountains. I expect a Winter Weather Advisory to be issued by the National Weather Service so stay tuned for more updates.{/p}{p}High temperatures will also come crashing down into the lower 50s by Thursday.{/p}{p}Another winter storm is on track for next weekend so stay tuned!{/p}{p}CURRENT SNOWPACK: UPPER COLORADO RIVER BASIN - 71% (115% last year at this time){/p}{p}LAKE MEAD TRACKER: Lake mead is currently at 1068 feet compared to 1044 feet one year ago today.{/p}{p}Total valley rainfall in 2023: 4.59\" (+0.41\" above normal){/p}{p}Total valley rainfall through December 31st, 2022: 2.13\" (-1.95\" below normal){/p}{p}AIR QUALITY - HEALTHY{/p}{p}-Bill Bellis{/p}{p}Couples from across the country packed Las Vegas wedding chapels as they looked to get married on a very unique day.{/p}{p}Ahead of the magical '123123' date, locals as well as visitors were seen lining up at the downtown Marriage License Bureau, which also opened a{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/clark-county-to-open-marriage-license-office-at-airport-for-upcoming-wedding-rush-las-vegas-southern-nevada-december-31-2023-123123#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/clark-county-to-open-marriage-license-office-at-airport-for-upcoming-wedding-rush-las-vegas-southern-nevada-december-31-2023-123123#\"} {strong}pop-up office{/strong} {/a}at Harry Reid Airport.{/p}{p}Aside from that, many couples wanted to start the year off on the right foot by getting married on January 1, like{ }Patrick and April Renfro of New Mexico, who married at The Little Vegas Chapel as the clock struck midnight.{/p}{p}{strong}MORE ON NEWS 3 |{ }{/strong}{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/watch-las-vegas-ushers-in-2024-with-a-dazzling-electric-fireworks-spectacle\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/watch-las-vegas-ushers-in-2024-with-a-dazzling-electric-fireworks-spectacle\"}{strong}WATCH: Las Vegas ushers in 2024 with a dazzling fireworks spectacle{/strong}{/a}{/p}{p}According to the chapel, they hosted 41 ceremonies on December 31, which was an increase in reservations compared to the previous year's festivities.{/p}
